page.title: 04Changing Times in Irvine.
page.content: We went into the shopping mall to ask people what they felt about the changes which had taken place in {Irvine}recently. Some of the people like the new town more than the old town. Some said there was no difference.{The new town}is cleaner and much nicer. It is easier with the shops all together and under cover. {The old town}had more character. It wasn't busy and was easy to go through.Some people missed the picturesque bridge which used to span the river where the mall now is. The people who missed the old town missed the country-side around, which had been used for building, they missed the bridge, the quietness, the old streets and the friendships. Everyone said they would like to see{more jobs available.
